cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses the evaluation of text summarization approaches, specifically for scientific articles. This topic falls under the natural language processing (NLP) domain, which is covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category as it covers NLP research. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also a likely sub-category as it deals with techniques for retrieving relevant information from large collections of documents. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible sub-category as machine learning techniques are often used in NLP research. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DL (Deep Learning) are also possible sub-categories as they cover research related to artificial intelligence and deep learning, which are often used in NLP research.
